name: Under The Weather (Coatline)
description:
*Full screen recommended*

You are trying to protect Jim from the out of control weather by building structures.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam

Controls:

Place Blocks - [LMB]

Toggle Edit Mode - E

Skip Build Phase - Space

Change Block Size - 1,2,3

Rotate Block - Scroll Wheel

Delete Block (in edit mode) - [RMB]

Attach Blocks (in edit mode) - [LMB]
